title: Lessons of Darkness: Herzog Documents Kuwait Oil Fires
summary: Werner Herzog's 1992 documentary captures apocalyptic aftermath of Gulf War oil fires
content: Directed by Werner Herzog in 1992, 54-minute war documentary, Shows burning Kuwaiti oil fields after Gulf War, Highly rated with 100% on Rotten Tomatoes, Blends sci-fi and documentary styles, Iraqi army set fires during Kuwait retreat
